title: Ultimate Harry Potter Trivia Challenge
description: Test your knowledge of the Harry Potter universe, including characters, spells, potions, and Hogwarts Legacy. With 160 questions across Easy, Moderate, and Hard difficulties, this quiz is perfect for fans of all levels!
